alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson and Franklin Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of New Hope to Stampley. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hamburg around 125 PM CDT. New Hope around 130 PM CDT. Kirby around 135 PM CDT. Bude around 145 PM CDT. Garden City around 155 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Roxie and Meadville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
